description: [Power Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0177) overwrites Explorer’s Shell_TrayWnd extra window memory to redirect execution to a NTDLL function that is abused to assemble and execute a return-oriented programming (ROP) chain and create a malicious thread within Explorer.exe.(Citation: MalwareTech Power Loader Aug 2013)(Citation: WeLiveSecurity Gapz and Redyms Mar 2013)

external_references.description: MalwareTech. (2013, August 13). PowerLoader Injection – Something truly amazing. Retrieved December 16, 2017.
Matrosov, A. (2013, March 19). Gapz and Redyms droppers based on Power Loader code. Retrieved December 16, 2017.
